commit message:
Improve coverart fetching
- Add more sources : deezer, discogs, gracenote, musicbrainz
- Fix local cover fetching
- Improve the cover download by using httpclient instead of just a connection

Improve coverart fetching
- Replace the whole LastFM project by a single class.
- Minor fix : Remove duplicate file names.
- Minor improve : use the class name in the log

Add Spotify album cover fetcher
Do not lookup for covers when album is not defined
Add an utility class to check for string null or empty
Minor improve : Use isNullOrEmpty to perform string checks

HTTP Robustness improve
Use AndroidHttpClient (better default settings)
Make sure always to free resources to avoid memory leaks

Remove logs
- Do not log unless DEBUG==true

Last improvements

Tag cover view with artist + album before download cover to avoid displaying wrong cover.
- When the cover has been downloaded the resulting cover is displayed only if it matches the tag set in the album cover view
It is useful for the nowPlaying fragment which displayed the last downloaded cover even if it was a previous played song

Cover Manager improve: add priority

Fix cover manager

- Fix bitmap sharing problem with recycling (make a copy first)
- Discard non matching notifications for the cover not found event

- Add a way to stop the cover executors
- Do not process requests without album or artist

Improve robustness to temporary network problems.

Fix : Cannot load tracks from album name with double quotes
=> Escape the double quotes
Before this commit :
find 'artist' 'Keith Anderson' 'album' 'Full of Soul 'Live at Ovations''
After this commit :
find 'artist' 'Keith Anderson' 'album' 'Full of Soul \'Live at Ovations\''

Blacklist wrong cover
- A long click on the cover opens a menu with an item 'Other image ...' to blacklist the current cover  image url and try to load a new one.
The cover urls and blacklisted cover urls are stored in two files in the cover directory  : covers.bin, wrong-covers.bin
These 2 files can be removed with  the clean cover cache existing method.

Fix #327 : List cover art progress bar spins forever
- Cover progress bar display is now triggered by the message 'onCoverDownloadStarted' sent by the cover manager.
- The cover is then displayed by the album cover listener when it receives the onCoverDownloadStarted message.
- The cover manager sends the onCoverDownloadStarted message when the cover is downloaded from the web (no progress bar when the cover comes from the cache)

Improve cover fetching speed
Factorize cover download requests even if their priorities are different.
Allows to factorize requests from the nowplaying fragment (high priority) and from the playlist (normal priority)
